Overall Grade.description: Evaluate overall quality, clarity, and professionalism of the resume. Final output should be a grade (A+, A, ..., C-).

sub_criteria.name: Content Completeness
sub_criteria.description: Includes all core sections: education, experience, projects, skills, honors.

sub_criteria.name: Clarity of Expression
sub_criteria.description: Clear writing, logical flow, and well-structured sections.

sub_criteria.name: Formatting Quality
sub_criteria.description: Consistent layout, fonts, spacing, bullet points.

sub_criteria.name: Professional Tone
sub_criteria.description: Language is professional and avoids vague/colloquial terms.

sub_criteria.name: Position Relevance
sub_criteria.description: Resume shows clear adaptation to a target role or domain.

Vertical Consistency Grade.description: Evaluate how consistently the resume aligns with a clear career path or domain. Final output should be a grade (A+, A, ..., C-).

sub_criteria.name: Education-Experience Alignment
sub_criteria.description: Academic background and practical experience are in the same domain.

sub_criteria.name: Skill-Project Match
sub_criteria.description: Project content reflects and reinforces listed skills.

sub_criteria.name: Award Relevance
sub_criteria.description: Honors and awards are related to the target field.

sub_criteria.name: Keyword Consistency
sub_criteria.description: Key domain-related terms appear repeatedly and coherently.

sub_criteria.name: Career Trajectory Coherence
sub_criteria.description: A clear professional development trajectory is visible.

Completeness Grade.description: Evaluate whether the resume includes sufficient detail in each section. Final output should be a grade (A+, A, ..., C-).

sub_criteria.name: Date Presence
sub_criteria.description: Each experience includes a start and end date.

sub_criteria.name: Role Clarity
sub_criteria.description: Descriptions explain what the candidate did in their role.

sub_criteria.name: Quantified Results
sub_criteria.description: Achievements are measurable or outcome-driven (e.g., 'reduced error by 20%').

sub_criteria.name: STAR Structure
sub_criteria.description: Descriptions include Situation, Task, Action, Result elements.

sub_criteria.name: Detail Coverage
sub_criteria.description: All sections are detailed without major gaps or placeholders.
